messages.body: $AAPL should stick to what they do best, great hardware+os. Getting into content creation by hiring some Sony execs isnt the right path
$AAPL AirPods have changed my life! How did I ever live without them. Lol
$AAPL How is spedning 1-2B to create content when everyone else is spending way more. Not to mention where is Apple wrt to live sports?
$AAPL Board needs to rethink their AppleTv roadmap. Do they want to disrupt how content is distributed bc the current initiative isnt.
$AAPL Cue just needs to step down already. How is Apple going to really grow services with their content creation endeavors; it is pathetic

links.title: Larry Kudlow Emerges as Trump Favorite to Replace Cohn, Sources Say
links.description: CNBC personality Larry Kudlow has emerged as President Donald Trump's favorite to replace Gary Cohn, the outgoing director of the White House National Economic Council, two people familiar with the matter said. Trump may name Kudlow as his top economic adviser within a day or so, one of the people said.

Trump Issues Order Blocking Broadcom Takeover Of Qualcomm: http://ow.ly/bXVR30iUl4a $AVGO $QCOM $INTC $AAPL

links.title: Donald Trump Issues Order Blocking Broadcom Takeover Of Qualcomm | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
links.description: President Trump late Monday issued an order stating that the proposed Broadcom ( AVGO) takeover of Qualcomm ( QCOM) is prohibited. The Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States had cited national-security concerns in recent days, even though Broadcom is moving to redomicile in the U.S. from Singapore.
